description: Detects issues with Windows Defender Real-Time Protection features
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Christopher Peacock '@securepeacock' (Update)
false_positives: Some crashes can occur sometimes and the event doesn't provide enough information to tune out these cases. Manual exception is required
name: Windows Defender Real-Time Protection Failure/Restart
query: (winlog.channel:"Microsoft-Windows-Windows Defender/Operational" AND winlog.event_id:("3002" OR "3007") AND (NOT (Feature_Name:"%%886" AND Reason:("%%892" OR "%%858"))))
